description: From a series of four etchings for the story "Der Rebell" by Manfred Georg, Heinrich Hochstim-Verlag, Berlin, 1918; man in lower left corner with hands holding onto a railing in front of him; sketchily drawn figures behind him, some wearing tophats
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Belegexemplar Marsyas
portfolio: From Plate 2 from Der Rebell (The Rebel), Manfred Georg, Heinrich Hochstim-Verlag, Berlin, 1918
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18 | LL in pencil, below image: Manfred Georg : der Rebell
title: Robert in the Theater, Plate 2 from Der Rebell (The Rebel)
